Package org.cooperari.feature.thread

Yield point support Thread life-cycle methods.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CThreadFeature
    Thread life-cycle yield points feature.
    CurrentThread
    Operation for sending a (simulated) spurious wakeup to another thread.
    GetState
    Operation for sending a (simulated) spurious wakeup to another thread.
    Interrupt
    Cooperative operation for Thread.interrupt().
    Interrupted
    Cooperative operation for Thread.interrupted().
    IsInterrupted
    Cooperative operation for Thread.isInterrupted().
    Join
    Cooperative operation for Thread.join(), Thread.join(long) and Thread.join(long, int).
    Sleep
    Cooperative operation for Thread.sleep(long) and Thread.sleep(long,int).
    SpuriousWakeup
    Operation for sending a (simulated) spurious wakeup to another thread.
    Start
    Cooperative operation for Thread.start().
    Stop
    Cooperative operation for Thread.stop().
    ThreadOperation<T>
    Base class for operations involving thread methods.
    Yield
    Cooperative operation for Thread.yield().
    YieldPoints
    Thread yield points.

Package org.cooperari.feature.thread Description

Yield point support Thread life-cycle methods.
